doccontrol (0.3.0)

An enyo controller for nested documents on both the client and server

Module index

us_states.coffee

A mapping of state misspellings/abbreviations to normalized abbreviations, and alphabetical lists of US states, territories, military mail regions and non-US states to which the US provides postal service.

This exists in this standalone file so that it's only imported into memory when explicitly needed.

Classes

  • USAddressField

Functions

  • dFields(fields)

ContainerFields.coffee

DocControl allows you to create arbitrarily nested forms, to validate arbitrary data structures. You do this by using ContainerFields. create a nested form by creating a containerField then adding subfields to the schema. See example in README.md.

Classes

  • BaseContainerField
  • ContainerField
  • HashField
  • ListField

utils.coffee

These function are used throughout the library. Many provide cross-platform (server and browser) support for frequently-used functions.

Functions

  • interpolate(s, args)
  • ValidationError(message, code, args...)
  • includes(a, s)
  • isEmpty(obj)
  • isEqual(v1, v2)
  • strip(str)

index.coffee

Validators.coffee

Validators are small classes that have a validate method. the validate method takes a single value. if the value is invalid throw a utils.ValidationError

Classes

  • RegexValidator
  • URLValidator
  • IntegerValidator
  • EmailValidator
  • SlugValidator
  • IPv4AddressValidator
  • IPv6AddressValidator
  • IPv46AddressValidator
  • CommaSeparatedIntegerListValidator
  • BaseValidator
  • MaxValueValidator
  • MinValueValidator
  • MinLengthValidator
  • MaxLengthValidator
  • MaxDecimalPlacesValidator
  • MinDecimalPlacesValidator
  • MaxDigitsValidator

Functions

  • ip_address_validators(protocol, unpack_ipv4)
  • isEmpty(val)
  • utils._is_shorthand_ip(ip_str)
